name: westernize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause the ideas and ways of doing things that are common in North America and most of Europe to be used and accepted by someone or something in or from another part of the world

world history to fill with qualities typical of a western region, esp. Western Europe and America westernization noun [ U ] (also Westernization) us/ˌwes·tər·nəˈzeɪ·ʃən/
world history The process of westernization in China is spreading rapidly.
